lines.text: Mmmmmm, you really know how to take care of your old step-dad don't you?
Where in the hell are you getting all this stuff from?
Are you kidding? You're a famous guy. I've known your soul a long time, man.
pirates and faggots. I don't see no ship in our driveway.
I'm here to see your father. Is he in?
No. No, he's not here. Did you and daddy have a date?
Come off it Pricilla, I am not in the mood. I need to talk to someone.
You sound like a hysterical Mrs. Miller.
If I was Mrs. Miller, I would be hysterical, because Mr. Miller's dead.
